channel.title: Comments for Come Up del Sur

item.title: Comment on Into the Wild by Katy
item.dc:creator: Katy
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/into-the-wild/#comment-29">Felix</a>.
Hey Felix, thanks a lot and nice to hear from you. We can really recommend the trip and Ecuador in general, is a good small country to see and explore a lot of different things. I saw that you are yourself getting into a new adventure - job related. All the best for that! :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Felix.

Hey Felix, thanks a lot and nice to hear from you.
We can really recommend the trip and Ecuador in general, is a good small country to see and explore a lot of different things.
I saw that you are yourself getting into a new adventure – job related. All the best for that! ðŸ™‚

item.title: Comment on Into the Wild by Noah Villazon
item.dc:creator: Noah Villazon
item.description: Great recount of events Simon! It's brilliant to see the trip documented properly, now I can show this to people when they ask how it was thanks
item.content:encoded: Great recount of events Simon! It’s brilliant to see the trip documented properly, now I can show this to people when they ask how it was ðŸ˜„ thanks

item.title: Comment on Welcome to Colombia by Simon
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description: In reply to <a href="/welcome-to-columbia/#comment-24">Camilo</a>. Cool, I didnâ€™t know that you lived in MedellÃ­n. Yeah, initially was a bit overwhelming but we quickly found our way around and then really enjoyed it! I think we could see into the classrooms of the Uni from our hotel room^^ Nice to hear from you
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Camilo.

Cool, I didnâ€™t know that you lived in MedellÃ­n. Yeah, initially was a bit overwhelming but we quickly found our way around and then really enjoyed it!

I think we could see into the classrooms of the Uni from our hotel room^^

Nice to hear from you ðŸ™‚

item.title: Comment on Welcome to Colombia by Camilo
item.dc:creator: Camilo
item.description: Yeah, even Colombians prefer to take Uber which is why the taxi drivers complain so much. It has already been banned like 3 times though . I used to live and study quite close to the neighborhood of your hotel, glad you liked it.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, even Colombians prefer to take Uber which is why the taxi drivers complain so much. It has already been banned like 3 times though ðŸ™ˆ.
I used to live and study quite close to the neighborhood of your hotel, glad you liked it.
